title: Distance Class Design and Effectiveness Analysis for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining in-person and remote instruction. Requires real-time lecture participation and project execution via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners propose strategies for effectively acquiring nursing theory and practical skills in remote education environments.
Learners design methods to compensate for the limitations of remote education using nursing practice simulation tools.
Learners analyze survey data to evaluate readiness for and effectiveness of remote education and write a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
